channel.title: Dragon Assassin Set (will release when i can get someone to make ints and anim)
channel.description: I apologize for this new thread i actually had one of my plans canceled for today and decided to make it a personal day so i actually was doing this almost all day (off and on) this isn't the COMPLETED set as my title may have hinted im planning on making a complete set. xD and so to clear up any Questions im OCD in a way so all my things are organized and colors labeled. so here it is i hope you guys enjoy and soon im planning on releasing a template model for meta that i design almost all of my chest plates out of.And as for the color scheme its not related to Dharoks in any way. well it could be im not 100% stuck on the name but enough of my worthless rambling. here it is ^^ [IMG]http://i879.photobucket.com/albums/ab351/Kirikugi_2009/dfas.png[/img] [IMG]http://i879.photobucket.com/albums/ab351/Kirikugi_2009/V5.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i879.photobucket.com/albums/ab351/Kirikugi_2009/V5back.jpg[/img]

i’ll add ints and anims just pm me the models i will do in meta and send you the results

item.title: Dragon Assassin Set (will release when i can get someone to make ints and anim)
item.dc:creator: @kirikugi kirikugi
item.description:
@kirikugi wrote:

well only the one with the emblem is a strap the other are Sashes. so i gave it a falling motion. and i dont understand your question completely. i make them as a separate item per but as i make them i go ahead and connect them so i can sorda connect the dots

Read full topic

item.title: Dragon Assassin Set (will release when i can get someone to make ints and anim)
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

I just don’t like how the back straps match the front, it should be a little different to the front. Something about the legs still looks wrong, i cant point it out though. Are you just adding the new models to the old ones or are you connecting them?

Read full topic
item.source: Dragon Assassin Set (will release when i can get someone to make ints and anim)

item.title: Dragon Assassin Set (will release when i can get someone to make ints and anim)
item.dc:creator: @kirikugi kirikugi
item.description:
@kirikugi wrote:

Yea im doing so slight modifications plus boots. and im working on a cape. but ive never made a cape before so its sorda out of my range. and i already have the legs fixed on my V3 version. and as for the back of it im not going to add anything to the back because the cape will be good enough and plus theres only so much stuff that can go onto it without making it look trashy. but im thinking about tinkering with the colors a tad. idk if its going to Portray the NOBLE look i want so it may be more on the lines of an Assasin

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Very nice. I disagree that the back needs more stuff on it. It’s fine as is. Very nice color shading. Only things I don’t like is the leg looks a bit odd (the red one) and the gloves. Can’t picture how the gloves are gloves.

Read full topic
